events.description: The Second Amendment to the Restated Trust of Jeffrey E. Epstein was executed, detailing the distribution of trust assets upon his death.

keyFacts: The document is a formal amendment to the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
It specifies the distribution of $2,000,000 to Jean Luc Brunel and other beneficiaries upon Epstein's death.
Lesley Katherine Groff, Luciano Fontanillo, and Rosalyn Fontanillo are also named beneficiaries.
The amendment was executed on January 13, 2004.
The document includes a notary acknowledgment by Lauren J. Kwintner.
